channel.title: Okemos CS Club
channel.description: Recent content on Okemos CS Club

item.title: New Year
item.description: Okemos CS Club will be continuing this year. We are planning on competing in the governor’s cybersecurity challenge, MHacks, and Spartahack. I have not come up with a first meeting date and time quite yet, so watch for it on the website. I will try and announce it in school, and I will put up posters for it. We will most likely have a few meetings in September just for the Cybersecurity Challenge and for MHacks.

item.title: End of the year
item.description: The year is now drawing to a close. This year, Okemos CS Club went to Spartahack, where we competed, and many of our members learned basic programming skills. Next year, we will be going to both MHacks, Spartahack, and we will be competiting in the governor’s cyber security challenge. I reccomend learning some of the basics of cybersecurity if you wish to participate. Next year, our meetings will be every Tuesday, from 2:45 to 3:45.

item.title: First Meeting
item.description: Our first meeting is on Oct. 11th. This meeting will probably be about 30 minutes to give new members a good idea of what this club is about. Please refer to the FAQ page to see what you need to bring.

item.title: Welcome to the Okemos High School Computer Science Club Website
item.description: “Students will gain programming experience that will be applied to the real world”

item.title: FAQ
item.description: When do we meet? We meet on Tuesdays in Mr. Harrod’s room (Room No) from 3:00 - 3:45 When is the first meeting? Our first meeting is on Oct. 11th, for the 2016-2017 school year. This meeting will probably be about 30 minutes to give new members a good idea of what this club is about. Do I need to bring anything? You should bring in your student or personal device to code on, and some scrap paper to sketch out ideas.

item.title: Important Dates
item.description: Club Related Oct. 11th, 2016: First Meeting Our first meeting is on Oct. 11th, for the 2016-2017 school year. This meeting will probably be about 30 minutes to give new members a good idea of what this club is about. Competition Oct. 7-9th, 2016: MHACKS Takes place from Oct. 7-9 Link: MHACKS
